name: Slime Minigolf
description:
Play as a slime and complete the golf course!

WASD to move.

Hold spacebar to charge, and release to shoot. 

You lose slime as you launch yourself, reducing your size and launch power. Try and reach the goal while retaining most of your slime for a fun challenge!

3D Modeling assets created by asdfasd

Music loop by ShadyDave - https://freesound.org/s/325647/
